str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be displeased or offended with. From pros and a form of ochtheo; to feel indignant at.
Forty. The decade of tessares; forty.
A year. Apparently a primary word; a year.
By no means, not at all. Intensive of ou; not indeed.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: Perhaps from a and the base of meros; properly, to miss the mark, i.e. to err, especially to sin.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Plural

str2: A limb, member of a body; fig: a corpse, carcass. From the base of kolazo; a limb of the body.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A reduplicated and contracted form of peto; probably akin to petomai through the idea of alighting; to fall.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
